innerHTML:
If you aren’t following my other blog (Design Heroes) you missed out on all these awesome links:

Usable Efficiency

Usable Efficiency is a new video blog with the aim of helping you improve websites with very practical and knowledgeable tips. Definitely one for the RSS reader.

PEN Giant

One of the more superficial reasons I bought my Olympus PEN E-P1 (my best purchase ever by the way) was the great advertising campaigns Olympus has produced - I don’t want to be “that guy”, or a tourist, I want to be Kevin Spacey. And PEN Giant is another superb piece directed by Takeuchi Taijin with the help of no computer generated graphics.

And finally…

Hayaku: A Time Lapse Journey Through Japan from Brad Kremer on Vimeo.

This one needs to be watched to appreciate it.

In other news!

I’ve recently acquired a couple of awesome design related books which will be reviewed after I recover from the traumatic 1-1 England vs USA draw last night.
